snippet: Mr. Wilpers was an Army intelligence officer in World War II who finally received military honors in 2010 for his role in capturing Hideki Tojo, the former Japanese prime minister.
abstract: John Wilpers, last known surviving member of team of Army intelligence officers who captured Japanese Prime Min Hideki Tojo after World War II, dies at age 93.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Wilpers was an Army intelligence officer in World War II who finally received military honors in 2010 for his role in capturing Hideki Tojo, the former Japanese prime minister.

headline.seo: John Wilpers, Who Captured Tojo, Dies
headline.main: John Wilpers Dies at 93; Captured Tojo
headline.print_headline: John Wilpers Dies at 93; Captured a Prime Minister

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
